duties.duty: Participated in the filming (films, TV series, clips): PES, Secret Doors, Tank, Forbidden Love, Witch.
Was also responsible for managing the recording department on the road.
Experienced in setting up audio equipment like sound device Pix 240i - Pix 260, Pioner mixers 600 - 900, mics Sennheiser, RODE and Lectrosonic (Synchronization of video recording + sound).
